name: Hasty Reaper
description:
Help the Hasty Reaper to find its right target in the short time that it has! But be careful to not be too hasty, as any mistake will limit the Reaper's time further.

Just identify the right target among the walking people, and take their soul with the repear before you run our of time.

-------

Leave a comment and rate the game if you enjoyed it, any input is greatly appreciated !

Also If you enjoyed the game and the idea behind it, please consider donating- even a dollar :) - as this support can help me go on with my future indie game projects :D
